title: Workshop on Designing Mathematics Education Based on Science Communication

context.prior_knowledge: Three+ years of math-related work experience and foundational science communication comprehension
context.additional_context: Exploring methods for in-service mathematics teachers and educational experts to apply scientific communication skills in mathematics education.

learning_goals: Develop strategies to explain complex mathematical concepts to non-experts using science communication theory
Create instructional materials that promote participant interaction by designing mathematics education activities based on a constructivist approach
Develop formative assessment tools applying social cognitive theory to measure mathematics learning effectiveness
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
